headline: Merchant Stakes $2.5B Los Angeles RIA
summary: Merchant made a minority investment in IFC Advisors, the Los Angeles-based RIA where Jim Hays, former Wells Fargo Advisors CEO, landed last year.

headline: Omnicom Interpublic Merger Reshapes Core Business And Valuation Story
summary: Omnicom Group (NYSE:OMC) has completed its acquisition of Interpublic, creating what it describes as the world's leading marketing and sales company. The company is realigning its portfolio, planning to sell or exit noncore operations alongside a $5b share repurchase program. Management is also integrating advanced AI tools across its service platform as part of the post deal restructuring. For investors watching NYSE:OMC, the move comes with the stock at $80.75 and a 35.4% return over the...
